titleInfo.title: Academy of Motion Picture Arts and Sciences Nomination of Clarence Brown for an Academy Award for "The Yearling"

mods.abstract: Director Clarence Brown won an Academy Award for "The Yearling," which tells the story of an American family living in Florida shortly after the Civil War. Ezra "Penny" Baxter (Gregory Peck) is a hardworking farmer struggling to support his wife, Orry (Jane Wyman), and single surviving son, Jody (Claude Jarman, Jr.). When Penny is bitten by a rattlesnake, he is forced to kill a doe to obtain the necessary antivenin. Jody begs to keep her orphaned faun, and his father agrees. When the faun becomes a yearling, however, it begins breaking into the garden that the family depends on for both food and money. As a result, Jody is forced to make a heartbreaking choice.
